She uses her income to support her parents and will use this loan to enlarge her hairdressing salon so that it can accommodate her and her 3 apprentices. She would like to save the profits from her business so that she can eventually buy her own land.

loans.use: to buy beauty products and hair extensions.

loans.name: Angélica

texts.es:
Angélica es socia del Banco Comunal Estrella, tiene 25 años, es socia de Finca Perú desde hace un año.
Angélica tiene un puesto de verduras en el Mercado de su localidad, desde muy pequeña trabaja, recuerda que con el primer crédito que tuvo compró verduras y también se compró un ropero, ahora ya con mas experiencia y todo esto gracias a las capacitaciones que ha recibido. Con el préstamo que esta solicitando viajará a Lima y comprará ahí las verduras que son mas baratas, ahora la meta que tiene es poder construir su casa.
texts.en:
Angélica is a member of the Estrella ["Star"] Communal Bank. She is 25 and has been a member of Finca Peru for one year.
Angelica has a vegetable stand in her local market. She has worked since she was very young. She tells us that she used her first loan to purchase vegetables. She also bought a closet. Now she has more experience. All of this is thanks to the training that she has received. With this requested loan, she will travel to Lima and purchase cheaper vegetables. Now, her goal is to be able to build her home.

loans.use: to buy vegetables in Lima.

loans.name: Lidia Esperanza

texts.es: Lidia Esperanza: de 54 años de edad ella se dedica a la venta de medicina desde hace 15 años ella nos dice que cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo esta contenta porque le gusta vender y poder ayudar a las personas con alguna enfermedad,ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de medicinas y tener mas variedad en medicina ya que sus clientes le piden diferente clase y a beses no tiene,el sueño de ella es seguir lchando por las metas que aun le faltan por alcanzar.y seguir ayudando en su hogar.
texts.en: Lidia Esperanza, who is 54 years old, has made her living for the last 15 years selling medicine.  She tells us that she has her husband's support, and she is happy because she likes to make sales and to help sick people.  She is requesting the loan to purchase medicine so she can offer a greater variety to her customers.  Her customers ask her for different types of medicines, and sometimes she doesn't have them.  Lidia Esperanza's dream is to keep striving to reach her goals, which she still hasn't met, and to continue being a help to her household.

loans.use: to purchase medicine to sell.

location.town: Aldea Vista Hermosa, San Pedro Sacatepequez

loans.name: Zacarias Luis

texts.es:
El Señor Zacarias tiene 42 años de edad, está casado con la Señora Elida de 46 años de edad, con quien tiene 2 hijos, María Mercedes de 18 años de edad, quien esta estudiando confección y Luis Fernando de 16 años quien esta en el tercer año de la Educación Media.
El Señor Zacarias se dedica a la fabricación de Bloques de cemento para cordones de empedrados desde hace más de 5 años, y se independizó hace 2 años aproximadamente. Ahora cuenta con sus propias herramientas e insumos, y posee su negocio en su propio domicilio, trabaja con la Municipalidad y también con contratistas de obras de empedrados. Es una persona muy trabajadora y sacrificada, quien esta muy agradecido con la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le da.
El solicita el préstamo para la compra de cemento que es la materia prima fundamental para la elaboración de los bloques de cemento que vende.
texts.en:
Señor Zacarias, who is 42 years old, is married to Señora Elida, who is 46 years old.  Together they have 2 children.  María Mercedes is 18 years old and studying dressmaking.  Luis Fernando is 16 years old and in his third year of high school.
Señor Zacarias has made his living for the past 5 years fabricating cement blocks for cobbled paving.  He went out on his own approximately 2 years ago.  He now has his own tools and supplies, and he runs his business out of his own home.  He works with the municipality and also with contractors who do cobbling work.  Señor Zacarias is a very hard-working, self-sacrificing person.  He is very grateful to Fundación for the opportunity that they are giving him.
Señor Zacarias is requesting the loan to purchase cement, which is the basic raw material for making the cement blocks that he sells.

loans.use: to purchase cement to make cement blocks.

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.en:
Svetlana is married with grown-up children. She sells women’s clothing at the central market in Kahovka town. Her main clients are plus-size women. Svetlana has been in this business for eighteen years. She enjoys working in sales very much.

Svetlana is requesting a loan of 7,000 Ukrainian grivnas to purchase seasonal merchandise. She hopes to earn additional profit and improve her living conditions. This business is the only source of income for Svetlana.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal clothing merchandise.

loans.name: Livinston Jahir

texts.es:
Livinston Jahir tiene 24 años, Es soltero vive con los padres en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. No tiene  hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JOSE DE LOS AMARILLOS se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Amarillos, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul, etc.

Livinston se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandúl. Compra sus productos en Comercial Murillo y los vende en la misma localidad.
El crédito anterio le a ayudado mucho para sembrar más hectarea de terreno y poder suplir las necesidades  al momento de veneder los productos y poder aportar para la alimentación y medicación de los padres.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas de maíz, arroz, frejol gandúl y compra de insumos, fertilizantes para los cultivos.   El crédito será de mucha ayuda para sembrar más hectarea de terreno y poder suplir las necesidades económicas al momento de veneder los productos y poder aportar para la alimentación y medicación de los padres y poder culminar los estudios. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima.
Su sueño es superarse y trabajar con dinero propio.

Le gusta andar en moto y disfrutar de las festividades del cantón.
texts.en:
Livinston Jahir is 24. He is single and lives with his parents in the Ventanas Canton, Los Rios province. He has no children.

The 'San José de los Amarillos' community bank is located in Amarillos community, in Ventanas canton. The members of this community bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice, gandul beans, etc. Livinston is a farmer who grows corn, rice, and gandul beans. He buys and sells his products in the Murillo shopping area.

His previous loan helped him greatly in sowing more hectares of land and covering his needs until sale. It helped him to be able to provide food and medicine for his parents.

He is requesting this loan for buying corn seeds, rice, gandul beans, supplies, and fertilizers for his cultivation. This loan will be a great help for him in sowing more hectares of land and covering his needs until sale. It will help him to provide food and medicine for his parents, and to finish his studies. He faces challenges in his business such as insect infestations, plant disease and changes in the weather. His dream is to get ahead in life and to work with his own money.
He enjoys going for motorcycle rides and taking part in the canton's festivities..

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, rice, gandul beans, and to buy supplies and fertilizers.

loans.name: Leoncio

texts.es:
Leoncio es un luchador que siempre ha trabajado por el bienestar y la estabilidad de su familia, anteriormente trabajaba en supermercados del municipio de Rionegro, en el departamento de Antioquia, y allí adquirió muchos conocimientos para aplicar actualmente en su negocio, desde hace 1 año Leoncio tiene una tienda que es el sustento de su familia, y diariamente se levanta con la ilusión de ver crecer su negocio y que éste sea un legado para sus hijos en un futuro.

Con esta motivación Leoncio quiere comprar un surtido mas variado y en mayores cantidades que le generen mas ventas y utilidades, igualmente que sus clientes lo prefieran por la calidad y variedad de los productos que ofrece en su negocio, pero él no cuenta con este capital para invertir, por lo que solicita un préstamo que le permita progresar y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Leoncio is a fighter who has always worked for his family's well-being and stability. He used to work in supermarkets in the Rionegro municipality, in the Antioquia department. There he gained a lot of knowledge which he now applies to his business. Leoncio has had a store for one year, and through it he now supports his family. He gets up every day with the hope of seeing his business grow and become an inheritance for his children in the future.

With this in mind, Leoncio wants to buy more varied stock in greater quantities to generate him more sales. His customers prefer his business because of the quality and variety of products that he offers, but he does not have the capital to invest. This is why he is requesting a loan, which will allow him to progress and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy items to stock his store.

loans.name: Veronica Vanessa

texts.es: Verónica Vanessa tiene 35 años, su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 2 años que tiene este medio de vida, ella ha logrado obtener con mucho sacrificio este negocio, pues no ha sido fácil sobrellevar todos los problemas que a diario se le presentan, a pesar de estos obstáculos Verónica ha sabido salir adelante. El crédito es para la compra de sabanas, cremas, ropa en general, ropa interior, electrodomésticos, entre otros.
texts.en: Verónica Vanessa is 35. She has sold general merchandise for two years. With a great deal of sacrifice, she was able to obtain her business; it hasn't been easy to deal with all of the problems that present themselves daily. However, in spite of these difficulties, Veronica has been able to get ahead. This loan is for the purchase of sheets, creams, general clothing, underwear, home electronics, and other items.

loans.use: to buy sheets, creams, general clothing, underwear, home electronics, and other items.

loans.name: Dario Andres

texts.es:
Dario Andres  tiene 22 años, es soltero vive los padres en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. No tiene hijo.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JOSE DE LOS AMARILLOS se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Amarillos, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandúl.

Dario se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandúl. Compra sus productos en Comercial Murillo y los vende en la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar semillas de maíz, arroz, frejol gandúl y compra de insumos, fertilizantes, urea, abonos agrícolas para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades económicas. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es poder reunir dinero y comprarse una casa para poder casarse.

En los tiempos libres le gusta jugar indor.
texts.en:
22 year old Dario is single and lives with his parents in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province. He has no children. 
The members of the “SAN JOSE DE LOS AMARILLOS” communal bank are located in Amarillos which belongs to Ventanas Canton. They are short-cycle corn and rice farmers. 
Dario farms corn and rice. He buys his products in Comercial Murillo and sells them there as well. 
He is asking for a loan to buy seeds of corn, rice, and beans and to buy farming supplies and fertilizer for the crops. Support from the loan will help him economically to meet his needs. The challenges he faces are infestations of pests, illnesses, and climactic variations. His dream is to be able to save money and buy his own house so he can get married.
In his free time, he likes to play sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds of corn, rice, and beans, and to buy supplies and various fertilizers

loans.name: Eligio Isidro

texts.es:
El Señor Eligio tiene 27 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Itá en casa de sus padres. Él es de profesión electricista, tiene su propio negocio hace ya 3 años, la experiencia la adquirió hace ya 6 años en donde anteriormente trabajaba como empleado, pero luego decidió independizarse y montar su propio negocio.
Comenta que tiene muchas ventas debido a que su negocio está ubicado en un lugar estratégico, a metros de una ruta principal. Dice que gracias a su negocio el puede ayudar en los gastos de la casa y de esa forma aligerar un poco a sus padres. Le gusta mucho su trabajo y desea poder seguir en el. Su objetivo es tener su propio local  ya que evitara el pago del alquiler y eso le permitirá tener más ahorros.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de repuestos para su posterior venta. Agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le da, pues es de mucha ayuda para él.
texts.en:
Eligio, 27, lives in Itá in his parents’ house.  He is an electrician and has had his own business for 3 years.  He gained experience starting 6 years ago when he worked for another electrician but he decided to go it alone and form his own business.

He says that he has a lot of busienss since he is located in a strategic spot, a few feet from a main street.

He tells us that thanks to his business he can help with the household expenses and ease the burden on his parents a little.  He really likes his work and wants to be able to continue.  His goal is to have his own shop so that he can avoid paying rent and this would let him have more savings.
He is requesting the loan to buy parts for later sales.  He thanks the Foundation for giving him this opportunity; it’s a great help with his project.

loans.use: to buy parts for later sales

loans.name: Víctor Jhonny

texts.es:
Víctor Jhonny tiene 29 años, vive en Union Libre vive con la compañera y los hijos en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 2 hijos de seis, y cuatro años de edad.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JOSE DE LOS AMARILLOS se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Amarillos, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Víctor se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Comercial Murillo y los vende en la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para  la compra de semillas, insumos fertilizantes , urea, abonos, veneno para la maleza  para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. 
Su sueño es comprarse una casa nueva y superarse.

Le gusta hacer deporte en especial practicar el ciclismo y el indor.
texts.en:
Víctor Jhonny is 29 years old. He lives with his partner and children in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province. He has two children of 6 and 4 years of age. 
The 'San José de los Amarillos' community bank is located in Amarillos community, in Ventanas canton. The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice. 
Víctor is a farmer who grows corn and rice. He buys his products in the Murillo shopping area and sells his products in the same place. 
Víctor is requesting this loan to buy seeds, various fertilizers, and weedkiller for his crops. The support of this loan will help him to financially cover his needs. He faces challenges in his business such as insect infestations, plant diseases, and changes in the weather. 
His dream is to own a new house and to get ahead. 
Víctor likes to play sport, particularly indoor soccer and cycling.

loans.use: to buy seeds, various fertilizers, urea, abonos, and weedkiller.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es:
Felicitas es socia del Banco Comunal Arrieros, tiene 50 años, es madre soltera y tiene 8 hijos. 
Felicitas se dedica a la venta D. quesos en la puerta D. un horno D. chaplas y en su casa tiene una tienda, con la ayuda D. los prestamos pudo salir adelante, ahora el préstamo que solicita lo utilizará para comprar mas quesos y poder comprar abarrotes para su tienda, lo que ahora desea es poder mejorar su tienda esa es su meta y ahorrará para ello.
A Felicitas le gusta las capacitaciones que recibe en su Banco Comunal porque le ayudaron a poder ser mas fuerte y a tener valores.
texts.en:
Felicitas is a member of the community bank Arrieros. She is 50 years old, a single mother, and has 8  kids.
Felicitas works selling cheeses and she has a store in her house. With the help of the lonas she has had, she has been successful. She will use the loan that she is requesting now to buy more cheeses and to buy groceries for her store. What she wants now is to be able to improve her store - this is her goal and she is saving for it.
Felicitas likes the training that she gets from the community bank because this helps her to be stronger and to have values.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, and groceries for her store.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos Alberto  tiene 40 años vive en Unión Libre tiene un hij,  vive con la conyugue y el hijo de tres años de edad en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JOSE DE LOS AMARILLOS se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Amarillos, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Carlos se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol gandúl. Compra sus productos en Comercial Murillo y los vende en la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, arroz y fréjol gandúl y compra de insumos y fertilizantes, abonos agrícolas, para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es poder superarse y llegar a tener un negocio de venta de ropa para poderlo administrar.

En los tiempos libres le gusta leer los textos coómo ser un buen líder..
texts.en:
40 year old Carlos Alberto lives with his partner and their three year old son in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province. 
The members of the “SAN JOSE DE LOS AMARILLOS” communal bank are located in Amarillos which belongs to Ventanas Canton. They are short-cycle corn and rice farmers. 
Carlos is a farmer and grows corn, rice, and beans. He buys his products at Comercial Murillo and sells them there as well. 
He is requesting the loan to plant corn, rice, and beans, and to buy farming supplies and fertilizer for his crops. Support from the loan will help him economically to meet his needs. The challenges he faces are infestations of pests, crop diseases, and the variations in the weather. His dream is to get ahead and to have a clothes store to manage. 
In his free time, he likes to read so that he will be a good leader.

loans.use: to sow rice and beans and to buy supplies and fertilizers.

loans.name: Duo Nueva Esperanza Group

texts.es: Duo Nueva Esperanza: Isabel.de 55 años de edad ella se dedica a la venta de granos basicos desde hace dos años, ella nos cuenta que esta contenta porque le ha ido bien en su negocio,y gracias a Dios a progresado mucho en su negocio,ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de granas basicos ya que ultimamente sus clientes han aumentado y nececita mas capital para trabajar.el sueño de ella es tener un local mas grande y ayudar a su familia.
texts.en: Duo Nueva Esperanza [New Hope Duo]: Isabel is 55 years old. She has been selling staple grains (pulses) for the past two years. She is very happy because her business is going well and thanks God for the growth of her business. She is requesting this credit to buy staple grains, since the number of customers has increased and she needs more capital to work. Her dream is to have a bigger locale and to help her family.

loans.use: to buy staple grains.

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es: Alejandrina tiene 43 años, convive con Juan de 45 años y tienen cuatro hijos que aún están en etapa escolar y juntos radican en su propia casa situada en la ciudad de Santa Rosa. Ella se destaca por ser una mujer con muchas responsabilidades que cumplir, por ello se despierta desde muy temprano para dirigirse a su centro de trabajo y abrir las puertas de su negocio en espera de sus primeros consumidores. Dicho negocio funciona desde hace 10 años, y desde entonces se dedica a ello, vendiendo productos de primera necesidad, tales como arroz, azúcar, fideos, detergentes, conservas y entre otros. Se siente muy contenta en su puesto de trabajo, por que gracias a ello adquirió bienes para su hogar, además que puede cubrir los gastos de educación de sus queridos hijos. Su  puesto de ventas se sitúa en la ciudad de Santa Rosa y es muy concurrido por su clienta. Espera contar con el apoyo financiero para poder prestar un buen servicio a sus consumidores exigentes. Este será su noveno crédito y tiene como proposito cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas puntualmente. Con el dinero solicitado comprará una congeladora para que pueda conservar mejor sus productos lácteos.
texts.en: 43 year old Alejandrina lives with 45 year old Juan and they have 4 children who are still in school. Together, they live in their own home in the city of Santa Rosa. She stands out for being a woman with many responsibilities. She gets up very early to drive to her work and open the doors of her business to await her first customers of the day. She has been running this business for 10 years, and in this time she has been dedicated to it, selling basic groceries such as rice, sugar, noodles, detergents, jellies, and other things. She is very happy in her work because, thanks to this job, she has added assets to her home and she can cover the cost of her dear children's education. Her food stall is located in the city of Santa Rosa and it is very busy with her customers. She hopes to have the financial support to be able to offer good service to her demanding customers. This will be her 9th loan and she promises to make her repayments punctually. She will use the money to buy a freezer so that she can better preserve her dairy products.

loans.use: to buy a freezer

loans.name: Liliana

texts.es:
Liliana es socia del Banco Comunal Chacco, tiene 19 años y es socia hace 1 año.
Liliana tiene un Restaurante y una tienda, a su corta edad siempre se dedicó a trabajar, ella recuerda que su primer crédito lo utilizó para poder ir a Tambo y comprar verduras, ahora hará lo mismo con su préstamo, porque en tambo esta mas baratas las verduras, lo que desea es poder mejorar su tienda.
Las capacitaciones en su Banco Comunal le ayudan a poder administrar mejor su negocio y a ser mejor persona.
texts.en:
Liliana is a member of 'Chacco' community bank.  She is 19 years old and has been a member for one year.

Liliana has a restaurant and a store.  At her young age, she has always worked.  She recalls that she used her first loan so that she could travel to Tambo to buy vegetables.  She will do the same thing with this loan because vegetables are cheaper in Tambo.  What she would like is to be able to improve her store.

The training sessions Liliana attends with her community bank help her to be able to better run her business and to be a better person.

loans.use: to buy vegetables in Tambo

loans.name: Martha Gricely

texts.es:
Martha Gricely tiene 53 años, es soltera vive con  el hijo de veintidos años de edad en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JOSE DE LOS AMARILLOS se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Amarillos, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Martha Gricely se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol gandúl. Los productos los Compra y vende en ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes, urea, abonos agrícolas, insecticidas para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.

Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es seguir en el negocio y aumentar la producción.

En los momentos libres le gusta ver la televisión en especial las novelas.
texts.en:
Martha Gricely is 53 years old.  She is single and lives with her 22-year-old son in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.

The 'San José de los Amarillos' community bank is located in Amarillos community, in Ventanas canton.  The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Martha is a farmer who grows corn, rice and pigeon pea.  She buys her products in Comercial Murillo and sells them in the same place.

Martha is requesting this loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, urea, manure and insecticides to keep her crops in good condition.

The support of this loan will help Martha to financially cover her needs.  She faces challenges such as pests, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  Her dream is to continue in her business and increase her production.

In her free time, Martha enjoys watching television, particularly soap operas.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, urea, manure and insecticides

loans.name: Blas

texts.es:
El señor Blas es carpintero, oriundo de la ciudad de Ybycuí. Desde muy pequeño ya le gustaba trabajar y lo empezó haciendo con su vecino que era carpintero de profesión. Ya con el paso del tiempo sintió la necesidad de independizarse para obtener un poco más de ganancias ya que este pensaba que si trabajaba en forma independiente iba a lograr su objetivo.
Salió del lugar en que estaba trabajando por dicha razón, pero había un problema, estaba sin capital suficiente para la compra de las herramientas necesarias así es que viajo a la Argentina para juntar lo necesario para la compra de lo que le hacía falta. Ya de regreso a su país de origen empezó con su pequeña empresa. Poco después se caso y su esposa tuvo un hijo.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de una cepilladora eléctrica, lo cual le facilitará de gran manera en los trabajos que el realiza.
texts.en:
Blas is a carpenter from the city of Ybycuí. He has enjoyed working ever since he was a child, when he started working with his neighbor, who was a carpenter. Over the years he felt he should begin working on his own so he could earn a little more income, which he thought he could achieve by going independent.
He therefore left the place he'd been working, but there was a problem: he didn't have enough money to buy the necessary tools. So he traveled to Argentina to scrape together enough to buy what he needed. Once he was back in his country, he started his little business. Soon after, he got married, and he and his wife had a son.
He is requesting a loan to buy an electric planer, which will help him a great deal in his work.

loans.use: to buy an electric planer for his workshop.

loans.name: Guicela Mercedes

texts.es:
Guicela Mercedes  tiene 34 años, tiene  5  hijos de diecisiete, dieciséis, quince, trece, seis meses de edad, vive con  conyugue  y con los hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JOSE DE LOS AMARILLOS se dedican a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol gandul.

Guicela Mercedes se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol gandúl. sus productos los compra y los vende en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas, sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es tener una casa para poder vivir tranquila.

En los tiempos libres le gusta hacer deporte y escuchar música.
texts.en:
Guicela Mercedes is 34 years old and lives with her husband and five children, aged 17, 16, 15, 13 and 6 months.

The members of San José de los Amarillos community bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.

Guicela is a farmer who grows corn, rice and pigeon peas.  

Guicela is requesting this loan to buy corn and rice seeds.  She will buy supplies and fertilizers for her crops.  The support of this loan will help her to financially cover her needs.  She faces challenges such as pests, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  Her dream is to own her own home where she can live peacefully.

In her free time, Guicela enjoys taking part in sports and listening to music.

loans.use: to buy corn and rice seeds, supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Rosa Alicia

texts.es:
Rosa Alicia  tiene 41 años, tiene 5  hijos de veinte, diecinueve, diecisiete, catorce y nueve años de edad. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JOSE DE LOS AMARILLOS se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Amarillos, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz,arroz y fréjol gandúl.

Rosa Alicia se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol gandúl. Compra y vende los productos en la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, insumos, urea para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es poder apoyar a los hijos para que puedan culminar los estudios universitarios.

Le gusta salir a disfrutar de las festividades del recinto y hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Rosa Alicia is 41 years old. She has 5 children who are 20, 19, 17, 14 and 9 years old, and she lives with her partner and her children.  The 'San José de los Amarillos' community bank is located in Amarillos community, in Ventanas canton. Its members work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and peas.

Rosa Alicia is a farmer who grows corn, rice and peas. She buys her products in the Murillo shopping area where she also sells them. She is asking for this loan to buy seeds, fertilisers, supplies and urea for her crops. The support of this loan will help her to cover her financial needs. She faces challenges in her business such as insect infestations, plant diseases and changes in the weather. Her dream is to be able to support her children through university. She likes playing sport and going out to enjoy local festivities.

loans.use: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, insumos, urea para los cultivos

loans.name: Rosa Angelina

texts.es: Rosa Angelina tiene su negocio que es la venta de mercadería en general. Tiene más de 4 años en su negocio, como toda madre responsable tiene que buscar cómo sacar adelante a sus 3 hijos de 10, 5 y 11 años. Ella tiene su negocio en el mercado pues la mayoría de sus clientes llegan a comprar los productos que ofrece. El financiamiento que utiliza es para la compra de ropa, cosméticos, calzado, billeteras, bolsos, tratamientos entre otros.
texts.en: Rosa Angelina has a business selling general merchandise. She has had the business for more than four years. She is also a responsible mother who needs know how to get ahead for her three children who are 11, 10 and 5 years old. She has her business in the market, so the majority of her customers come to buy the products that she sells. The loan will be used to purchase clothing, cosmetics, shoes, wallets, bags, treatments and other items.

loans.use: purchase clothing, cosmetics, shoes, wallets, bags, treatments and other items.

loans.name: Edwin Alexander

texts.es: Edwin Alexander  de treinta y tres años de edad vive con su compañera de vida y sus hijos en ciudad cercana a capital del país. El posee una venta de producto de cemento, fabrican creativamente diferentes esculturas de todos tamaños, siempre al gusto del cliente; últimamente ha aumentado la demanda de su producción pues es de muy buena calidad a excelentes precios y además Edwin les ofrece un buen servicio siempre los recibe muy amable y con una sonrisa en el rostro; el es un hombre decidido y trabajador siempre dispuesto a cumplir sus metas, piensa que el secreto para llegar al éxito es el trabajo constante y la actitud positiva, quiere hacer crecer el negocio por eso le solicita  a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar materia prima, cemento , hierro y algunos utensilios para la fabricación. Edwin Alexander tiene confianza que de esta forma logrará darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Edwin Alexander, age 33, lives with his life partner and their children in a city close to the capital of the country.

He has a business selling cement products.  He creatively makes different sculptures of all sizes, always to his customer’s liking.  The demand has currently increased because his production is of very good quality and excellent prices.  Also, Edwin offers good service.  He always greets his customers in a very friendly way with a smile on his face.  

He is a determined and hard-working man who is always ready to meet his goals.  He believes that the secret to success is constant work and a positive attitude.

He wants to make his business grow.  To do so he is requesting a loan from Integral.  The loan will allow him to buy raw material like cement, iron, and some tools used for production.  Edwin Alexander is confident that this is the way to manage to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cement and iron.

loans.name: Yesica Paola

texts.es: A sus 19 años de edad Yesica es una joven emprendedora que decidió ser independiente económicamente como una forma de ayudar con la situación económica de su familia, comenzó trabajando en un almacén de ropa donde adquirió algunos conocimientos que hoy en día aplica en su propio negocio, Yesica vende roma femenina y masculina. Sueñan con tener un almacén reconocido entre sus clientes y vecinos, pero es conciente que para ello debe seguir trabajando y progresando, y es esto lo que hoy la motiva a pedir un préstamo con el cual comprar una vitrina para exhibir la ropa, y también para comprar un surtido de gran cantidad que le permita tener mas ganancias, así sabe que sus ingresos se incrementarán y poco a poco podrá ir logrando su sueño.
texts.en:
At 19 years of age Yesica is an enterprising young woman.  She decided to become financially independent as a way to help her family’s financial situation.  She started working in a clothing store, where she got some knowledge that she now applies in her own business.

Yesica sells women’s and men’s clothes.  She dreams of having a store that is well-known among her customers and neighbors.  She is aware that in order to do so she needs to continue working and making progress.

That is the reason that she is now requesting a loan.  She will use it to buy a show case to display the clothes.  She will also buy a large amount of stock, which will allow her to have greater income.  She knows that her income will improve, and little by little she will be able to achieve her dream.

loans.use: to buy a display case and stock her business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy corn for making tortillas and an industrial griddle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy basic grains, sweets, drinks, instant products, and bread.

loans.name: Ñasaindy Group

texts.es:
10 mujeres de la ciudad de Paraguarí se reunieron con el propósito de interiorizarse mas en el programa de mujeres emprendedoras de la Fundación Paraguaya, el cual les resultó muy interesante y de allí surge el comité denominado Ñasaindy. Ellas han asumido el compromiso de mantener unido al grupo y trabajar siempre bajo un marco de responsabilidad y mutua cooperación. Actualmente se encuentran muy a gusto en el tercer ciclo del programa.
Una de las integrantes es la señora Miryan, ella se dedica a la cría de cerdos, este ha sido el medio de subsistencia de su familia desde hace un tiempo. Gracias a este trabajo ella puede paliar los gastos que diariamente surgen en el hogar. Comenta que su trabajo es muy duro, pues implica mucho esfuerzo, pero pese a eso no se cansa de trabajar.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de balanceados para sus animales, para que de esa forma tenga asegurado el alimento para los mismos.
texts.en:
Ten women from the city of Paraguarí joined together in order to become familiar with the Program of Women Entrepreneurs offered by Fundación Paraguaya, which they found to be very interesting. As a result, they formed the committee called “Ñasaindy”. They have pledged their commitment to maintain a unified group and to always work under a spirit of responsibility and mutual cooperation. At the moment, they have become very comfortable as they start their third loan cycle with the program.

One of the members is Sra. Miryan, who has been raising pigs for some time in order to support her family. Thanks to her work, she has been able to manage the daily household expenses. She says that her work is very hard because it requires a lot of effort, but she never gets tired of laboring. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy balanced feed for her animals so that she can secure the means of maintaining their diet.

loans.use: to buy feed for her pigs.

loans.name: Cruz Álcida

texts.es: Cruz Álcida de cuarenta y siete años de edad vive con sus hijos al occidente del país en zona rural, ella posee una tienda y tortillería en el lugar donde reside; vende productos de primera necesidad su tienda es muy surtida tiene tolo lo que sus clientes necesitan arroz, frijol, jugos, pan, además sus tortillas son muy ricas, todo lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y a precios muy accesibles el servicio es excelente Cruz Álcida siempre se ha caracterizado por su amabilidad. Se levanta desde muy temprano a trabajar atiende su negocio y lleva a moler el maíz, es una mujer muy entregada a su trabajo y quiere ver crecer su negocio es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, jabón, producto instantáneo, maíz entre otros. Cruz Álcida tiene la esperanza de que su trabajo le permitirá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Cruz Álcida, 47, lives with her children on the west side of the country in a rural area.  She runs a store and tortilla shop from her home.  She sells a variety of basic foodstuffs.  She has everything her customers need: rice, beans, juice, and bread; and her tortillas are delicious.  Everything she sells is very high quality and low cost.  Her service is excellent.  Cruz Álcida has always been known for her kindness.  She gets up very early to work and tend to her business, taking the corn to be ground.  She is devoted in her work and wants to see her business grow.  This is why she requests the loan from INTEGRAL; to buy grains, sweets, soap, instant products, and corn.  Cruz Álcida hopes that her work will allow her to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy grains, sweets, soap, instant products, and corn.

loans.name: Canelitas De San Antonio Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “CANELITAS DE SAN ANTONIO” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Senkata, está compuesta por nueve integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Aurora. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: siembra de papa, venta de chuño, cría de animales, tienda de barrio, taller de tejido.

La señora Aurora  indica que este es el primer ciclo que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una promotora y sus compañeras de grupo. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de crianza de ganado y cultivo de papa que viene trabajando desde su niñez, aprendo este oficio de sus papás. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra animales de granja y semilla para papa) que comprará de su comunidad y posteriormente lo venderá en las ferias. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia pues ella es casada  y tiene cinco hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el ahorro.
texts.en:
The “CANELITAS DE SAN ANTONIO” communal bank will begin its first cycle in Pro Mujer as a part of the Senkata center. It is made up of nine members and led by a board of directors headed by Aurora. The businesses that the members of the communal bank run are: growing potatoes, selling potato flour, raising animals, running a neighborhood store, and running a weaving workshop.  

Aurora  indicates that this is the first cycle that she has worked with Pro Mujer. She was invited by developer and by the group members. At present she has a business raising cattle and growing potatoes. She has done this since she was a child, and learned the trade from her parents. 

The loan that she will take out now is to increase her capital (buy farm animals and potato seed). She will buy in her community and later sell in the markets. This work enables her to generate income to support her family as much as possible. She is married and has five children.   

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the savings.

loans.use: to buy farm animals and potato seed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy perfume, cream, deodorant, cosmetics.

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es: Juan Francisco de 35 años de edad, habita en casa propia en zona semiurbana, junto con su querida familia la cual está conformada por su amada esposa de 35 años y su adorada hija. Juan es un hombre responsable, trabajador y sobre todo muy emprendedor. Hace varios años que logró establecer una pequeña tiendita en su hogar de residencia la cual le ha permitido dar a su familia el pan de cada día. Mantener el negocio en marcha no ha sido fácil, expresa Juan, ya que en la zona donde el reside hay otros negocios que compiten con su tienda y día a día aumentan los negocios que de una u otra forma van ganando terreno en la zona y consecuentemente restando clientes a su favor. Pero para Juan esto no es un obstáculo sino más bien un reto, ya que esto lo hace estar alerta ante los cambios en el mercado. Él cuenta con muchas ventajas ya que tiene mucha experiencia y además ya se ganó la confianza de sus vecinos, ya que para él lo más importante es que sus clientes estén satisfechos por lo que siempre se esmera por tener todo lo ellos necesitan. Juan es un hombre arriesgado y seguro, no le teme a ningún desafío. Todo esto lo ha motivado a  solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL con la fe puesta en Dios que de esta manera logrará mantener su negocio en marcha por muchos años más. Con el préstamo piensa comprar variedad de artículos de tienda como: bebidas, arroz, azúcar, frijoles, detergente, aceite, golosinas, etc. De tal forma que  los clientes lo sigan prefiriendo por su excelente servicio. De esta manera espera poder accesar a una mejor oportunidad de vida tanto para él como para su familia.
texts.en: Juan Francisco, 35 years old, lives in his home in a semi-urban area with his beloved family which is made up of his loved wife of 35 years and his adored daughter. Juan is a responsible, hard-working, and above all very entrepreneurial man. Several years ago he managed to establish a small store in his home residence which has allowed him to give his family their daily bread. Keeping the business going has not been easy, expresses Juan, as in the area where he resides there are other businesses that compete with his store, and day by day there are more businesses that by one way or another are gaining ground in the area and consequently taking way customers in their favor. But for Juan this is not an obstacle but rather a challenge since this has made him be alert to the changes in the market. He counts on many advantages since he has a lot of experience and moreover, has already won the trust of his neighbors. The most important thing to him is that his customers are satisfied, which is why he always puts a great deal of effort to have everything they need. Juan is a daring and safe man, and does not fear any challenge. All of this has motivated him to apply to Integral for a loan with the faith in God that in this way he will manage to keep his business running for many more years. With the loan he plans to buy a variety of store items like drinks, rice, sugar, beans, detergent, oil, candy, etc. so that his customers continue to prefer him because of his excellent service. In this way, he hopes to be able to obtain a better opportunity in life for him as well as for his family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of store items like: drinks, rice, sugar, beans, detergent, oil, candy.

loans.name: Hilda Isabel

texts.es:
Hilda Hisabe
la señorita Hilda Hisabel, desde hace cinco años ella comenzó su negocio de venta de tortillas, ya que  su papa falleció y nos comenta que solo su mama no podía con todos sus hermanos  por lo que deciodio hacer su negocio propio  y con lo que gana ha logrado seguir estudiando y  y vestirse y con lo que puede aporta a su mama para ayudarla con sus hermanos, para que ellos sigan estudiando, de igual forma esta alegre porque su negocio ha hecho que ella aprendiera a ser independiente  y valorar lo mucho que vale la vida
ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de productos de usos domesticos y copra de maiz para la elavoracion de tortillas.
texts.en:
Five years ago, Srta. Hilda Isabel started a business selling tortillas. She says that her mother was not able to support her and all of her siblings after her father died, so she decided to establish her own business in order to continue studying and pay for her clothes. With what she earns, Hilda is able to support her mother and help her siblings continue their education. Just as important, her business makes her happy because it has taught her how to become independent and to assess how much value there is in life.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy household products and corn for making tortillas.

loans.use: to purchase corn for making tortillas and household goods to sell.

loans.name: Ayde Esperanza

texts.es: Ayde Esperanza de 27 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto con su querida hija Liliana de 7 años de edad. La razón de que Ayde viva sola es porque su compañero de vida emigro hace unos años a Estados Unidos y con la ayuda de él y de su árduo trabajo es como va saliendo adelante. Ella es una joven muy emprendedora con muchos deseos de superación y de ver a su hija en mejores condiciones a las que ella ha tenido.  Hace algunos años logró establecer una pequeña tiendita en  su lugar de residencia en la cual vende diversidad de productos como: golosinas, aceite, pan dulce, cereales, verduras, zapatos y muchas cosas más. Este negocio es la principal fuente de ingresos de Ayde ya que la situación de su esposo no es estable y hay algunos meses que no recibe remesas ya que su esposo no cuenta con un trabajo fijo en el país en que se encuentra. Ha estado pensando mucho en la forma de hacer crecer su tienda y lograr aumentar su nivel de ventas ya que por el momento está sería la única forma de lograr sostenerse económicamente. Esto la motivo a solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su tienda en la compra de variedad de productos tales como: verduras, arroz, azúcar, frijoles, pan dulce, bebidas, detergente, golosinas. Etc. Sinceramente espera poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Ayde Esperanza, 27 years old, lives in her home with her dear daughter Liliana who's 7 years old. The reason that Ayde lives alone is because her life partner emigrated to the United States several years ago and with the help of his arduous work she has been able to stay afloat. She is a very entrepreneurial young person with a great desire for self-improvement and seeing her daughter in better conditions than those which she has had. Several years ago she managed to establish a small store in her home residence from which she sells a diversity of products like: candy, oil, sweet bread, cereals, vegetables, shoes, and many other things. This business is the main source of income for Ayde since her husband's situation is not stable and there are some months when she doesn't receive a remittance of money as her husband is not able to rely on a permanent job in the country in which he finds himself. She has been thinking a lot about how to make her store grow and manage to increase the level in sales as for the time being this is the only way to manage to support herself economically. This motivated her to apply to Integral for a loan in order to invest in her store purchasing a variety products such as: vegetables, rice, sugar, beans, sweet bread, drinks, detergent, candy, etc. She sincerely hopes to be able to better her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of products like: vegetables, rice, sugar, beans, sweet bread, drinks, detergent, candies, etc.

loans.name: Deysi Isabel

texts.es: Deysi Isabel de 31 años de edad, reside en casa propia en uno de los municipios mas populosos del país, junto con su grupo familiar que está integrado por su esposo, 3 hijos y su querida madre de 70 años. Deysi posee un puesto en el mercado central de la zona donde ella habita en el cual vende variedad de prendas de vestir para todos los gustos, tamaños y preferencias. Es una mujer trabajadora y responsable. Cuenta con mucha clientela gracias al carisma y amabilidad que la caracterizan. La ubicación del puesto es muy estratégico ya que se encuentra  a orillan de calle y es muy transitada. Ha trabajado duramente por muchos años para colaborar con la economía de su hogar ya que no le es suficiente con los ingresos que recibe de su esposo para mantener y darles las condiciones adecuadas a su familia. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su puesto en la compra de variedad de prendas de vestir como: pantalones, faldas, vestidos, ropa interior, blusas, camisetas, etc. de tal manera que su negocio sea atractivo y logre atraer a más clientes con el objetivo de lograr un aumento en el nivel de ventas. Y a si poder mejorar su condición de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Deysi Isabel, 31 years old, resides in her home in one of the most populated municipalities of the country with her family that consists of her husband, three sons, and her beloved mother of 70 years of age. Deysi owns a stall in the central market of the area where she lives from which she sells a variety of clothing for all tastes, sizes, and preferences. She is a hard-working, responsible woman. She has many customers thanks to the charisma and kindness which characterize her. The location of the stall is very strategic as it is located on the border of the street and is very busy. She has worked very hard for many years to collaborate with the finances of her home as they are not enough to support and provide her family with adequate conditions with the earnings that her husband receives. She has made the decision to apply to Integral for a loan in order to invest in her stall by buying a variety of clothing like pants, skirts, undergarments, blouses, shirts, etc. so that her business will be more attractive and will manage to attract more customers with the objective of attaining an increase in the level of sales, in this way being able to better the condition of her life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothing like: pants, skirts, dresses, undergarments, blouses, shirts, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bulk corn to make tortillas.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
Antonia tiene 53 años, es natural D. la ciudad D. Santa Rosa, se considera como una mujer trabajadora. Vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo y sus tres queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad D. vida. La agricultura es una actividad que durante mucho tiempo su familia lo ha ejercido, hoy ella continua con esta tradición familiar y en compañía D. su esposo, trabajan en sus tierras para que sean cada vez más fertiles. 
Los productos que siembra son: cacao y café, ya que estos tienen mayor demanda en el mercado. Por tanto debe procurar cuidar sus plantas D. la plaga D. insectos que puedan perjudicarlos, ya que podría reducir mucho sus ganancias; asimismo debe transportar sus productos hasta la ciudad D. San Francisco, pues es ahí donD. los comercializa. Este será su segundo crédito con MFP, y hasta el momento ha sido muy puntual en sus anteriores  pagos, es por ello que desea que lo sigan apoyando. Con los 1,000 mil soles, comprará trampas o mallas por metrajes para evitar que los insectos no perjudiquen sus plantas.
texts.en: Antonia is 53 years old, a native of the city Santa Rosa, and considers herself a hard-working woman. She lives in her own home with her husband and their three beloved children to whom she wishes to give a better quality of life. Agriculture is an activity that her family has practiced for much time. Today she continues this family tradition, and accompanied by her husband, they work their land so that each time it is more fertile. The products they sow are cacao and coffee as they have the greatest demand in the market. As such she must try to take care of her plants from the plague of insects that could harm them as this could greatly reduce their earnings. Also she must transport her products to the city of San Francisco as it's there where they're commercialized. This will be her second loan with MFP, and up until now she has been very punctual with her previous payments which is why they wish to continue supporting her. With the 1,000 soles, she will buy traps or lengths of screens to prevent insects from harming her plants.

loans.use: to buy screens to use as traps.

loans.name: Maritza Del Carmen

texts.es: Maritza del Carmen de 19 años de edad, reside en casa familiar junto a su madre e hija. Maritza es una mujer increíble que a pesar de su corta edad tiene muchas ideas de negocios y mucha energía para ponerlas en marcha. Ella se dedica a los negocios tales como venta de pupusas, ropa y productos de elote. Tiene  5  años de experiencias en este tipo de actividades. Una de los principales negocios es la venta de productos de elote como: tamales, atol, riguas, etc. Gracias a Dios y a su trabajo ha tenido buenos resultados en la venta de dichos productos y  cuenta con mucha clientela ya que para ella su prioridad es que sus clientes estén satisfechos con sus deliciosos productos,  además es muy carismática y amable razón por la cual las personas la prefieren. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de los insumos necesarios (elotes, azúcar, aceite, sal, etc.), para poder realizar los deliciosos tamales de elote y poder ponerlos a la venta. Ya que de esta forma es como ella se gana la vida y ayuda a salir adelante a su familia. Le ruega a Dios poder lograr su objetivo y tener la oportunidad de una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maritza del Carmen, 19, lives in the family home with her mother and daughter.  Maritza is an outstanding woman who, despite her young age, has lots of business ideas and energy to put them into practice.  She’s in such businesses as: pupusa [stuffed corn dumplings], clothes and corn-based products sales.  She has five years’ experience in this type of activities.  

One of her main businesses is the sale of products based on corn: tamales, atol, riguas [sweet corn wrapped in banana leaves and grilled], etc.  Thanks to God and to her work she’s had good results with the sales of said products and she has quite a few customers because her priority is that her customers are satisfied with her delicious products.  Besides, she’s very charismatic and kind which is why people prefer her.

She decided to ask INTEGRAL for this loan to invest in her business purchasing necessary supplies (ears of corn, sugar, oil, salt, etc.) to make the delicious corn tamales and sell them since this is the way she earns a living and helps her family get ahead.  She prays to God that she’ll be able to reach her goal and have the opportunity for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy ears of corn, sugar, oil, salt, etc.

loans.name: Cordillera Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “CORDILLERA” iniciará su sexto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Los Andes, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Rufina. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: Tienda de abarrotes, venta de tela, venta de salchipapas, material de construcción, venta de condimentos, tienda de barrio.

La señora Rufina indica que hace quince ciclos que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de una compañera amiga. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de accesorios para autos que viene trabajando hace años atrás.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de accesorios para autos) que adquirirá de los mayoristas y posteriormente lo comercializará en las ferias. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella casada y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el ambiente.
texts.en:
The A.C. “Cordillera” (“Mountain Range” Communal Association) will start its sixth cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Los Andes Community Center. It is composed of eight members, guided by a directive board presided over by Rufina. The members of the Communal Association engage in different activities such as: running a grocery store, selling cloth, selling salchipapas*, selling construction materials, selling dressings, running a general store.

Rufina says she has been working with Pro Mujer for fifteen cycles, and that she became a member of the institution thanks to the invitation of a friend. She is a retailer, and she has been selling car accessories for some years.

The loan she is now requesting will be used to increase her working capital. She will buy car accessories from wholesale retailers, and she then sell them at fairs. This type of job allows her to earn money to support her family, as she is married and has a child.

When asked why she likes Pro Mujer, she answers that she likes its atmosphere.

*Salchipapa is a typical dish composed of sliced pan-fried beef hot dogs or sausages and French fries

loans.use: To buy car accessories.

loans.name: Greydi Isamar

texts.es: Greydi de 21 años de edad es soltera, estudia el 5to año de la carrera de derecho en la UCA. Esta solicitando  su 2do credito con el objetivo de inscribir la monografia con la cual defendera su titulo, pues este trabajo lleva bastante tiempo y dinero, ya que debe comprar materiales didacticos y pagar un tutor que le ayudara con el trabajo, ademas esta haciendo sus practicas profesionales en el sistema penitenciario, el cual esta fuera de la ciudad, donde viaja 3 veces en la semana. Su mayor sueño es poder culminar su carrera y poder ayudar a personas que necesiten sus servicios.
texts.en: 21-year-old Greydi is single and studying her fifth year of a law degree at UCA.  She is requesting her second loan to register her research paper which she will defend in order to obtain her degree.  This entails a fair amount of time and money as she must buy educational materials and pay a tutor who will help her with her paper.  In addition, she is carrying out an internship in the prison system which is outside of the city.  She travels there three times a week.  Greydi's biggest dream is to be able to finish her degree and help people who need her services.

loans.use: to pay for tutoring and to register her research paper

loans.name: Orquídea

texts.es: Orquídea de 27 años de edad, reside en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeña hija de 5 años. Para ella lo más importante es su familia y es su principal inspiración. Orquídea trabaja duramente como empleada impulsando productos alimenticios.  Además para llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar, se dedica a la venta de productos con enchape de oro como: aretes, cadenas, pulseras, etc. ya que el poco dinero que gana en su trabajo no es suficiente para cubrir las necesidades del hogar, sus productos los ofrece a diferentes personas tanto en su trabajo como a vecinos, incluso en mercados como se aprecia en la imagen. Gracias a su carisma a logrado establecer muy buena clientela y ahora  muchas personas la prefieren porque ofrece variedad y buenos precios en sus productos. Últimamente ha notado que su negocio es rentable y que muchas personas demandan sus productos.  Es por esta razón que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito para comprar variedad de productos con enchape de oro (pulseras, aretes, cadenas, etc.). Le pide a Dios que su situación económica mejore y así poder darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Orquídea is 27 years old, and she lives in her own house with her life partner and her 5 year-old daughter. Her family is the most important thing to her, as well as being her main inspiration. Orquídea is an employee, and she works very hard promoting food products. Moreover, to provide for the family’s daily necessities, she engages in selling gold plated products such as earrings, chains, bracelets and so on, as the meager wage she earns with her job is not enough to pay for the necessities od her family. She offers her products to various customers: to her work colleagues, to her neighbors and in the markets as well, as we can see in the picture. Thanks to her charisma she has succeeded in gaining very good customers, and now many people chose her because she offers a variety of products at good prices. Lately she has realized that her activity is profitable, as many people ask for her products. This is why she has decided to ask for this loan, which will be used to buy various gold plated products (bracelets, earrings, chains, and so on). She hopes that her economic situation will improve, thus enabling her to offer a better standard of living to her family.

loans.use: To buy different gold plated products (bracelets, earrings, chains).

loans.name: Marcos Eusebio

texts.es: Marcos de 27 años de edad es soltero, trabaja como docente de Biología desde hace 7 años, ademas trabaja en las universidades como docente de Computación. Esta solicitando su crédito con el objetivo de mejorar su habitación repellándola y pintandola para contar con un ambiente agradable cuando esta en casa, pues ademas de impartir clases esta estudiando una maestria que le facilitaron en su trabajo.  Su mayor sueño es ser un profesional excelente y poder contar con las condiciones necesarias de una casa.
texts.en: Marcos is 27 years old and he is single. He is a biology teacher and he has been working for 7 years; he also works for the local universities as teaching computer skills. He is requesting this loan in order to make improvement to his house by having it plastered and painted, in order to find himself in a pleasant environment when he is at home. He would also like to give classes and he is studying to get a Master’s degree that will help him in his job. His biggest dream is to be an excellent professor and to be able to have the basic commodities in his house.

loans.use: To make improvements to his house.

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es:
Silvia es socia del  Banco Comunal “Central Vaquería”, ubicado en el distrito de Ilave, provincia El Collao, departamento de Puno, tiene 27 años de edad, es  conviviente y tiene un hijo.  Cuenta con educación secundaria.
Desde hace un ciclo trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de compra y venta de animales como ovejas.
Con éste nuevo préstamo por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles,  comprará tres unidades de ovejas, la señora cuenta que las compra y vende al instante, buscando siempre una ganancia.  Ella trabaja sola en el negocio, su esposo trabaja como obrero.
La señora desea tener más ganados y así mejorar sus ingresos.	
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del préstamo.
texts.en:
Silvia is a member of “Central Vaquería”, a Communal Bank of Vaquería, a neighborhood located in Ilave, a district of the El Collao province in the Puno department. She is 27 years old, she lives with her life partner and she has a child. She has a secondary level education.
She has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for one cycle already. She buys and sells animals such as sheep, and she has invested her previous loan of 500.00 PEN in her activity.
She is requesting a new loan of 500.00 PEN, and she will invest it in the purchase of three sheep. She says she buys them and she sells them immediately, always making a profit. She runs her activity alone, as her husband is a worker.
She would like to have more animals to sell in order to increase her earnings.
What she likes about her Communal Bank is the easy access to the loans.

loans.use: To buy three heads of sheep

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: Juan Carlos trabaja para la Alcaldia Muncipal de Juigalpa desde hace 2 años, desempeñandose como  colector. Esta solicitando  su 2do credito con el objetivo de mejorar su cuarto repellandolo y poniendole el piso y brindarle mayor comodidad a su familia. Cabe señalar que con el credito anterior logro reparar el techo del cuarto, y espera seguir contando con el apoyo de kiva para continuar mejorandolo.
texts.en: Juan Carlos has been working as a collector for the Juigalpa City Hall for 2 years. He is requesting his second loan to make improvements to his room by plastering it and by installing a floor, aiming to offer a better comfort to his family. It’s worth mentioning that with his previous loan he was able to repair the roof of his room, and he hopes to keep on counting on Kiva’s support to continue improving his room.

loans.use: To remodel his room.

loans.name: Petrona

texts.es:
Petrona es socia del  Banco Comunal “Central Vaquería”, ubicado en la parcialidad de Vaquería,  distrito de Ilave, provincia El Collao, departamento de Puno, tiene 42 años de edad, está  separada y tiene 3 hijos, 2 de ellos son independientes.  Cuenta con educación primaria.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace un año, con su primer préstamo de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles compró tres unidades de ovinos.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,000.00 nuevo soles comprará seis ovinos para su respectivo engorde por dos-tres meses.  Ella trabaja sola en el negocio, los animales los compra  y vende en la localidad de Ilave.
La señora desea tener ganados mejorados para incrementar su ganancia.	
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal  es la facilidad del préstamo y la unión entre las socias.
texts.en:
Petrona is a member of “Central Vaquería”, a Communal Bank of Vaquería, a neighborhood located in Ilave, a district of the El Collao province in the Puno department. She is 42 years old, she is separated and has 3 children, 2 of them economically independent. She has a primary level education.
She has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for one year, and with her first loan of 500.00 PEN she has bought three sheep.
She is now requesting a new loan of 1,000.00 PEN, and she will use it to buy six sheep to fatten them for two or three months. She runs her activity alone, and she buys and sells the animals in the Ilave community.
She wants to improve her animals to increase her income.
What she likes about the Communal Bank is the easy access to loans and the unity among its members.

loans.use: To buy six sheep.

loans.name: Irma Consuelo

texts.es: Irma Cosuelo. de 49 años de edad ella se dedica a la venta de comida como chirrascos, panes, aguas,etc desde hace 5 años inicio vendiendo con un poco de capital poco a poco fue creciendo y aumento su ganacias y compro aguas gaseosas,y asi poco a poco ahora esta contenta porque gracias a Dios su venta prospera y por eso esta solicitando este credito para la compra de mas mercaderia para la elavoracion de churrascos y panes,y agrandar mas su puesto de ventas de comidas,el sueño de ella es tener un local mas grande y ayudar a su familia.
texts.en: Irma Cosuelo is 49 years old. She sells food like barbecued steak, bread, water, etc. She has been selling food for five years. With a little money, she has grown and increased her income bit by bit, and she has bought carbonated water. So, now she is happy because, thanks to God, her business is prospering, and for that reason she is asking for a loan to buy more merchandise to make barbecued steak and break and to increase her food sale capacity. Her dream is to have a larger local store and to help her family.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to make barbecued steak and bread.

loans.name: Reyna Isabel

texts.es:
Reyna Isabel tiene 29 años, vive en Unión Libre vive con elconyugue y los seis hijos en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JOSE DE LOS AMARILLOS se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Amarillos, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol gandúl.

Reyna  Isabel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Sus productos los Compra y los vende en Ventanas sin ningun inconveniente.

Solicita el crédito para poder sembrar maíz, arroz y frédjol gandúl, el cliente comprara semillas, insumos y fertilizantes abonos agrícolas  para mantener los cultivos en buenas condiciones.  Con el apoyo del crédito anterior fue de mucha ayuda para poder suplir las necesidades y poder combatir las plagas de los cultivos.

La relación familiar ha mejorado porque ha podido aportar económicamente para los gastos de los estudios de los hijos.
En los tiempos libres le gusta salir de paseo y escuchar música.
texts.en:
Reyna Isabel, 29, is in a common law relationship with her spouse and six children in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.

The members of the “San José de los Amarillos” communal bank are located in the hamlet of Amarillos belonging to Ventanas Canton.  They are short cycle corn, rice and pigeon pea farmers.

Reyna is a corn and rice farmer. She buys her products at the Murillo Supply and sells there too.

She is asking for the loan to be able to plant corn, rice and pigeon peas.  She will buy seeds, supplies and fertilizer to keep her crops in good condition.  Support from the previous loan was of much help to her to be able to meet her needs and to combat the infestations in her crops.

Family relations have improved because she’s been able to contribute economically towards her children’s educational expenses.

In her spare time she enjoys going out on excursions and listening to music.

loans.use: to buy seeds and farming supplies.

loans.name: Nohely

texts.es:
Nohely  es socia del  Banco Comunal “Central Vaquería”, ubicado en el distrito de Ilave, provincia El Collao, departamento de Puno, tiene 22 años de edad, es soltera y tiene un hijo.  Cuenta con educación superior.
La señora es una socia nueva que recientemente se incorpora a trabajar con el  Movimiento Manuela Ramos, solicitará un préstamo de S/. 1,000.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invertirá en la compra  de seis animales,  los mismos que comprará en las ferias de Zepita, Juli, Huacullani, Acora.  Nos cuenta que los animales  a veces los engorda para conseguir un mejor precio, también los compra  y los carnea al instante, la carne la vende en la ciudad de Arequipa e Ilave.  En el negocio le ayuda su suegra y su esposo.
La señora desea tener una casa para vivir mejor.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del préstamo y la cordialidad entre las socias.
texts.en:
Nohely is a member of the 'Central Vaqueria' community bank which is located in Ilave district, in El Collao province, in Puno department.  She is 22 years old, single, and has one child.  She completed her higher education.

Nohely is a new member who recently joined Movimiento Manuela Ramos.  She is requesting a loan for 1,000 soles which she will invest in buying six animals.  She will buy the animals in Zepita, Juli, Huacullani and Acora markets.  She tells us that she sometimes fattens the animals to obtain a better price but she also buys them and slaughters them right away.  She sells the meat in the towns of Arequipa and Ilave.  Her mother-in-law and husband help her in her business.

Nohely would like to own a house so that she can live better.

What Nohely likes about her community bank is the ease of the loans and the friendliness between the members.

loans.use: to buy six animals

loans.name: St Michel (Jericho) Group

texts.fr: ST MICHEL (JERICHO) est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres mènent leurs activités dans le même marché au Bénin. La représentante du groupe, Houmè Geneviève (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 27 ans et est mariée à un chauffeur du nom de Narcisse. Le couple a un enfant qui est scolarisé et à leur charge. Houmè Geneviève vit ensemble avec son mari et son enfant. Le couple assure ensemble les différentes charges de la maison. Houmè Geneviève n'a pas fréquenté l'école. Depuis environs cinq ans, Houmè Geneviève vend des condiments de sauce et des produits divers dans un marché du Bénin. Houmè Geneviève s’approvisionne dans une ville du Bénin. C’est la première fois que Houmè Geneviève et les autres membres du groupe ST MICHEL (JERICHO) sollicitent l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue de renforcer leur fonds de roulement et leur activité et de mieux répondre aux exigences de leur clientèle.
texts.en:
ST MICHEL (JERICHO) is a group of three persons all of whom have their businesses in the same marketplace in Bénin. The representative of the group,  Houmè Geneviève (with her hand raised in the photo), is 27 and married to a chauffeur named Narcisse. The couple are raising one child who is enrolled in school. Houmè Geneviève lives together with her husband and her child. The couple cooperate in supporting their household. 

Houmè Geneviève was not able to go to school. For about five years, she has been selling condiments for sauces and various other products in a marketplace in Bénin. She buys her supplies in a town in Bénin. This is the first time that Houmè Geneviève and the other members of the group called ST MICHEL (JERICHO) are asking for a loan from ALIDé in order to bolster their working capital and grow their businesses so as to better respond to the needs of their clientele.

loans.use: to buy condiments for sauces and various other products.

loans.name: Justina

texts.es:
Justina  es socia del  Banco Comunal “Central Vaquería”, ubicado en el  distrito de Ilave, provincia El Collao, departamento de Puno, tiene 46 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 6 hijos.  Estudió hasta 3ro de educación primaria.
La señora se dedica a la venta de carne de cordero y alpaca, tiene un puesto en el mercado de la zonas, trabaja desde hace un año con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,000.00 nuevo soles, comprará siete animales para luego carnearlos, los compra en las feria de Acora, Ilave, Zepita.  En el negocio le ayudan sus hijos.
La señora desea seguir y mejorar el negocio para dar estudios a sus hijos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal  son las reuniones, la facilidad del préstamo y el ahorro.
texts.en:
Justina is a member of the "Central Vaqueria" Communal Bank, located in the Llave district, El Collao province, Puno department. She is 46, and a single mother of six. She has a third-grade education.
Justina sells lamb and alpaca meat and has a stall in the local market. She has worked with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for one year. Her first loan was 500 nuevo soles, which she invested in her business.
With this new loan of 1,000 nuevo soles, she will purchase seven animals to butcher later. She will buy them from the Acora, Llave and Zepita markets.
Her children help her with the business.
She wants to keep up her business and improve it in order to provide her children with an education.
What she likes about the Communal Bank are the meetings, the ease of acquiring a loan, and the savings.

loans.use: to buy seven animals to butcher.
